Description
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of leg guards! Change up your style with a guard that's different from others! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Abel de Street Fighter IV avec ces protège-tibias alternatifs ! Changer de style avec une garde différente des autres ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen Beinschutz wie Abel aus Street Fighter IV! Bietet dir einzigartigen Schutz! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Abel di Street Fighter IV con questo paio alternativo di parastinchi! Migliora il tuo stile con una guardia fuori dal comune! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este par de rodilleras y siéntete como Abel de Street Fighter IV! ¡Cambia tu estilo con unas rodilleras sin igual! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 アベルになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のガード 他とは違うガードで差をつけろ！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 아벨이 되는 어렌지 ver. 방어구. 색다른 방어구로 강해지자! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of leg guards! Change up your style with a guard that's different from others! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
